import React,{useState}from"react";import StudentForm from"./StudentForm";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function StudentApp(){const[students,setStudents]=useState([]);const[search,setSearch]=useState("");const courses=["Math","Science","History"];function handleAdd(student){setStudents([...students,student]);}// Filter students by name or course
